attributes.action: Petition to move Parent & Child Parking spaces
attributes.additional_details:
As a mother I know how difficult it can be getting my baby in and out of my car in a regular sized parking bay when Parent & Child bays are being used by people who do not need to use them.

I am aware that it isn't feasible for traders to monitor their car parks, therefore the action I would like the government to take is as follows:

I would like to see Parent & Child parking bays at supermarkets and other outlets to be moved further away from the front doors of stores, with the goal of deterring other members of the public who do not need the extra clearance to get in and out of their vehicle from parking in them unnecessarily.
